OOC: Do you simple mean a better dragon than he was
before, or the best dragon in the game.  If the later
I propose A DUEL ONE ON ONE BETWEEN AZURE BLADE AND
SHADOW STAR!  HEY AND IF HE'S SO GREAT WHY STOP THERE
IF CYBERWOLF EVER SHOWS UP AGAIN WE CAN GET MEGATON
AND SHADOW STAR TO FIGHT TOGETHER!

--- airly2000 <airly2000@...> wrote:
> Nightstrike/Alphah:
> 
> "TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SCUMB!!!!" shouted
> Nightstrike while  he 
> tried to free himself. The decepticon resisted to
> walk.
> 
> *****
> 
> "Azure... do you... er have pyscis' powers "asked
> Alpah "If you could 
> do it, you can use them to find out what happened
> with Condor and how 
> he became Nightstrike and... perhaps how we can help
> him..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Prowl/Epyon/Hot Rod/Skyburst::
> > 
> > Skyburst quickly grabbed Nightstrike, placing
> energy cuffs on him. 
> Hot
> > Rod transformed to bot mode, and also took hold of
> the Decepticon. 
> > 
> > "That may be what happans in your kind, but not
> here. You will not 
> be
> > killed unless you fight, and we dont torture our
> prisoners. Take 
> him to
> > a cell," ordered Prowl.
> > 
> > Hot Rod and Skyburst walked off, taking
> Nightstrike to a cell.
> > 
> > Prowl turned back to the others, as does Epyon.
> > "Well, we got Condor back," says Epyon.
> > "Now how do we help him?" Askes Prowl.
> 
>
